title: Spotted: New Fast Gravel Tire Coming from WTB?
content:
WTB already has some awesome tires for various gravel conditions, but it looks like another might be added soon. This hot patch-less tire was spotted on a Specialized Diverge, and it features a tread pattern that we haven’t seen before… Built wit more substantial center tread blocks than the popular Riddler, the tight spacing indicates

The post Spotted: New Fast Gravel Tire Coming from WTB? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
